caption:
This photo has a distinctly industrial, somewhat blurred and dreamlike quality. It's framed by what appears to be a metallic structure in the foreground, creating a rectangular view towards an industrial setting. This frame is composed of at least one horizontal beam and two angled beams that form an X-shape adding a geometric aesthetic to the image.

In the middle ground, a pair of seagulls are perched on a ledge, slightly out of focus, enhancing the photo's ethereal feel. Beyond the birds, a landscape that appears to be a marsh or wetland extends to the horizon, dotted with dry, brownish vegetation, suggesting a late summer or autumn season.

In the background, there are industrial elements like tall smokestacks and structured facilities with various metal fixtures and piping, indicative of a plant or factory. There's a vague movement or disturbance in the air quality around these structures, possibly hinting at pollution or mist. The overall scene is set against a washed-out sky, contributing to the photoâ€™s somewhat desolate and isolated mood.
title: Seagulls silhouetted on pipeline which carries sulphur from the mines to storage facilities on the Mississippi River. A natural gas installation in background burns its petro waste. Pipeline follows the Freeport Sulphur Co. pipeline canal.
